description:
The Tungsten II Pants are the perfect choice for backcountry tours and ski days, with premium waterproof protection and breathability levels. With a GORE-TEX® 2L shell and 85% recycled VerticalX Eco insulation, these pants will keep you dry and comfortable in all conditions.

They are fully seam-taped, waterproof, and windproof and feature waist adjustment tabs, belt loops, an avalanche beacon pocket, and zip hand pockets to keep essentials safe and close at hand. For those who want the warmth of insulated pants combined with the breathability of a hard shell, the Tungsten II Pants are the perfect outerwear solution.
name: Outdoor Research Tungsten II Pants, Short - Mens

specs.value: VerticalX Eco 100% Polyester (85% Recycled) Insulation 45 G
